Body: What can and should be done beforehand as a precautionary measure to locate the device or ascertain the identity of its holder, should a person unknowingly lose his/her device for any reason?I am thinking of ways which provides features, such as:keeping camera turned on nonstop upload data as much as possible to possibly capture holder's face and location along the way, or perhaps prevent the phone from being turned off and create a loud sound "THIEFS" in the middle of crowded busIf the solutions requires app, I would prefer such apps which can't be turned off.Also, perhaps something we can put on our keychain that will cry out loud if the distance between the Android device and the keychain is above 1 meter.
Title: Realistic preparations to be made beforehand to locate the device and/or ascertain identity of its holder?

history.Text: I am thinking of apps with features like turning on camera non stop and upload as much as possible. Possibly capturing the thief's face and location along the way.I prefer apps that can't just be turned off.Also perhaps something we can put on our keychain that will cry out loud if the distance between the android device and the keychain is above 1 m.
What apps allow you to hur thieves in case your android phone is stolen?
